com.sirqul.sdk.widget

Class SirqulArrayAdapter<T,U extends SirqulViewWrapper<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<T>
        • com.sirqul.sdk.widget.SirqulArrayAdapter<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type used for the content data for this subclass of ArrayAdapter.
    U - the generic type used for the view wrapper, must extend SirqulViewWrapper, where T is the same as T for this class, your content data type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, Filterable, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter

    public class SirqulArrayAdapter<T,U extends SirqulViewWrapper<T>>
extends ArrayAdapter<T>
    The SirqulArrayAdapter class allows you to only have to choose a data type, to supply a layout resource of your choice, and a SirqulViewWrapper instance based off your chosen data type and layout resource. The SirqulArrayAdapter will handle view recycling automatically. It also provides a way to tie a listener to a specific view or widget id contained in your layout resource through the use of the SirqulViewWrapperListener class. Additionally it allows you to supply additional data to a specific item within your SirqulArrayAdapter through the use of Bundle objects. This adapter can then be applied to things such as a ListView and other Android widgets that accept ArrayAdapter instances.
    Author:
    John Schleppy
